attributes.additional_details:
This Petition has been created to encourage all the world leaders to wipe all debt.
From a given date all personal, company and national debt will be reset to zero.
Simply put any debt you currently have will simple vanish at midnight. This would include loans and mortgages.
People in debt would be free of it over night
Struggling small businesses would have more money
Nations would no longer owe any other nation millions.

With the extra money now freed up, we would be able to kick start a new economy.
One that is free of debt and hopefully rebuild the damage that our past has caused.

 Please show your support.
